skill.name: Website Development
skill.description: In the realm of Website Development, I bring forth a comprehensive skill set honed through years of experience. Proficient in both front-end and back-end technologies, I specialize in crafting visually compelling and responsive user interfaces using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript

skill.name: Website Design
skill.description: In the dynamic realm of website design, my skill set is a fusion of creativity, user-centricity, and technical proficiency. Armed with a keen eye for aesthetics, I specialize in crafting visually compelling and intuitive user interfaces that elevate the overall user experience.

portofolio.name: Nuegash
portofolio.description: This is a portfolio dashboard website designed to implement the Pickolab Studio's visual style. The website is built using React and Supabase, with additional support from libraries such as Redux Toolkit, Apollo GraphQL, TailwindCSS, Framer Motion, and others. Currently, the website is in the development stage, and additional features, such as chat, themes, and internationalization, will be added in the future.

portofolio.name: Movies
portofolio.description: This is a website that show list movies that Ivan Rizky Saputra has watched to date. This website build using NextJs App dir and Framer Motion

portofolio.name: Nuntium Blog
portofolio.description: This is a website blog template made with NextJs and TailwindCss. Contain multiple page that can make reading become more fun

portofolio.name: Kampusin
portofolio.description: This website provides a list of universities in Indonesia for high school students. You can see the name of the university and its address. Click on the name to go to the campus official website
